alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued September 09 at 3:04AM EDT until September 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING... * WHAT...A high risk of rip currents and rough nearshore surf. * WHERE...Maryland Beaches County. * WHEN...Through Friday evening. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 09/07 AM 3.8 1.3 1.2 1 NONE 09/08 PM 4.0 1.5 0.9 1 MINOR 10/08 AM 3.4 0.9 0.7 1 NONE 10/08 PM 3.5 1.0 0.6 1 NONE 11/09 AM 3.4 0.9 0.6 1 NONE 11/10 PM 3.5 1.0 0.6 1 NONE &&
info.instruction: Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions.
